00019 #include "util/Err.h"
00020 #include "util/Util.h"
00021 //
00022 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00023 //
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 //
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00029   int megaByte = 1048576;
00030   uint64_t free=0, total=0, swapAvail=0, memAvail=0;
00031   bool retVal = Util::memInfo(free, total, swapAvail, memAvail);
00032   if(retVal != true) {
00033     Err::errAbort("Can't determine memory.");
00034   }
00035   else { 
00036     cout << "free: " << free / megaByte << endl;
00037     cout << "total: " << total / megaByte << endl;
00038     cout << "swap avail: " << swapAvail / megaByte << endl;
00039     cout << "mem avail: " << memAvail / megaByte << endl;
00040   }
00041   return 0;
00042 }
